Text.val: 08.12.2008 SH SCR14205 Set BXA900.PI.REPORTTYPE_STRING = 'SPC' to blank
04.12.2008 GB SCR14196 Changed transaction level in SelectINVO

-- Path and Filenames for Templates and Outputfiles
-- Get directories and convert them to OS Format (Windows/AS400)
-- Start producing XML File if no error occurs
-- Store system language, Report has to be printed in RO language

SQL_STMT_U.val: select count(*) from :1/INVO INVO where INVO.INVO_INVOICEDOCTYPE in (1, 2) and INVO.INVO_AACTUALI > 0 and INVO.INVO_JOURNALNO_SPC = 0 and (days(INVO_DUEDATE) - days(':2')) <= :3

select INVO.INVO_INVOICEDOCTYPE, INVO.INVO_CURRENCY, INVO.INVO_ADMNO, INVO.INVO_CLNTNO, INVO.INVO_DEBH_NO, INVO.INVO_INVDATE, INVO.INVO_AACTUALI, INVO.INVO_NO from :1/INVO INVO where INVO.INVO_INVOICEDOCTYPE in (1, 2) and INVO.INVO_AACTUALI > 0 and INVO.INVO_JOURNALNO_SPC = 0 and (days(INVO_DUEDATE) - days(':2')) <= :3 order by INVO.INVO_INVOICEDOCTYPE, INVO.INVO_CURRENCY, INVO.INVO_ADMNO, INVO.INVO_CLNTNO, INVO.INVO_DEBH_NO, INVO.INVO_INVDATE for fetch only

Text.val: build filename for temporary XML Files
build final filename for the XML File
Copy final XML File to tamino queue
Copy of final XML File failed
Only if FinalFile was copied to TaminoQueue by UFB523
-- Write one blank line with and a line with totals

SQL_STMT_U.val: select INVO.INVO_NO from :1/INVO INVO where INVO.INVO_INVOICEDOCTYPE in (1, 2) and INVO.INVO_AACTUALI > 0 and INVO.INVO_JOURNALNO_SPC = 0 and (days(INVO_DUEDATE) - days(':5')) <= :6 and INVO.INVO_INVOICEDOCTYPE = :2 and INVO.INVO_CURRENCY = ':3' and INVO.INVO_ADMNO = :4 for fetch only
